alert.note: Alert for Burleigh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 6:25PM CDT until August 01 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Burleigh County in south central North Dakota... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 624 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Wing, or 25 miles northeast of Bismarck, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Burleigh County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
